name: Adjusted net savings per capita (World Bank WDI (2017))
title: Adjusted net savings per capita (World Bank WDI (2017))
description: To calculate adjusted net savings per capita, adjusted net savings was divided by the World Bank's population, total.

sources.name: World Bank WDI - Adjusted net savings per capita (2017)
sources.dataPublisherSource: World Bank staff estimates based on sources and methods in World Bank's "The Changing Wealth of Nations: Measuring Sustainable Development in the New Millennium" (2011) and the UN Population Division, national statistical offices
sources.additionalInfo: To calculate adjusted net savings per capita, adjusted net savings was divided by the World Bank's population, total.

resources.path: Adjusted net savings per capita (World Bank WDI (2017)).csv

fields.name: Adjusted net savings per capita (World Bank (2017))
fields.description: Adjusted net savings are equal to net national savings plus education expenditure and minus energy depletion, mineral depletion, net forest depletion, and carbon dioxide. This series excludes particulate emissions damage.
